如果在<l0>首选项</l0>中定义了执行外部搜索的命令，则此处会列出这些命令。
If it is clear from the very start, that translations in a given TM (or TMs) are all correct, one can put them into the<e0> tm/auto</e0> folder and avoid confirming a lot of<e1> [fuzzy]</e1> cases.
如果从一开始就非常确定某些翻译记忆库中的翻译是完全正确的，则可以将其放入 <e0> tm/auto</e0> 文件夹，避免遇到多个 <e1> [模糊]</e1> 情形而加以确认。
If later access to the desired location is granted that location will be used and all settings will return to their defaults as a result of the location change.
之后若获得目标位置的访问许可，将改用该位置为配置文件夹。\n同时，由于位置更改，所有的配置将还原为默认值。
If no text has been selected, the current source segment is written to this file.
如果未选择任何文本，则将当前原文片段写入该文件。
If no text is selected, <a3>OmegaT</a3> selects the word that contains the letter immediately to the right of the cursor.
如果未选择任何文本，<a3>OmegaT</a3> 会选择紧挨着光标右边的那个字符所属的单词。
If not checked, source segments will not be shown.
如果未勾选，则不显示原文片段。
If part of the target segment has been selected, this function overwrites the selected portion.
如果已经选择了译文片段的一部分，则此功能会覆盖所选部分。
If several translation engines are selected, then <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>M</k2> </k0> is also used to switch between them and insert the last one selected.
如果选择了多个翻译引擎，则可以用<k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>M</k2> </k0>在它们之间切换并插入最后一个选定的结果。
If some texts are selected within the fuzzy match, only this selection will be inserted at the cursor position.
如果在模糊匹配内选择了部分文本，那么只有被选中的部分插入到光标位置处。
If some texts are selected within the fuzzy match, only this selection will replace the whole target segment.
如果在模糊匹配内选择了部分文本，那么只有被选中的部分替换掉整个译文片段。
If the Auto-propagation check box is not checked, the segments with alternative translations are left untranslated until the user has decided which translation is to be used.
如果未勾选自动传播复选框，则含有替代译文的句段会保持未译状态，直到用户决定使用哪种译文。
If the alignment looks as if it could be improved, try changing the parameters.
如果对齐效果看起来还能改进，可尝试调整参数。
If the current segment is the first one in a file, it moves to the last segment of the previous file.
如果当前片段是文件中的第一个片段，则会移动到上一个文件的最后一个片段。
If the current segment is the last segment in a file, it moves to the first segment of the next file.
如果当前片段是文件中的最后一个片段，则会移动到下一个文件的第一个片段。
If the current translation of the segment does not fit, the user can select <g0>Edit → Create Alternative Translation</g0>.
如果当前句段的翻译不恰当，用户可以选择 <g0>编辑 → 创建替代译文</g0>。
If the document allows, the translator is strongly encouraged to remove style information from the original document so that as few tags as possible appear in the OmegaT interface.
如果文档允许，强烈建议译者从原始文档中删除样式信息以在 OmegaT 的界面中尽可能少地显示标签。
If the documents are not available, the entry is greyed out.
如果文档不可用，则条目会灰掉。

If the files to be translated are parts of a tree structure (as in a website), you need only specify the top-level subfolder and OmegaT will maintain the entire contents, while keeping the tree structure intact.
如果待翻译文件是树形结构的一部分（比如像网站中），您只需指定顶级子文件夹，OmegaT 将维护整个内容，同时维持树形结构不变。
If the original document was LTR, the display direction of the target document must be changed manually to RTL in its viewing application.
如果原始文档是从左向右的，译文文档的显示方向需要手工在查看它的应用程序中改为从右向左。

If the project uses specific filters and segmentation parameters, both the <f0>filters.xml</f0> and <f1>segmentation.conf</f1> files must be added to the versioning system and published on the server.
如果项目使用专用过滤器和句段分割参数， <f0>filters.xml</f0> 和 <f1>segmentation.conf</f1> 文件必须要添加到版本控制系统，并发布到服务器上。
If the source file is modified after you have begun translating, <a1>OmegaT</a1> may be unable to find a segment that you have already translated.
如果在开始翻译后原文文件有所修改， <a1>OmegaT</a1> 可能会找不到您已经翻译过的句段。
If the source segment in one of the ancillary TMs is identical to the text being translated, OmegaT acts as defined in the <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>Editing Behavior...</g2> </m0> dialog window.
如果辅助翻译记忆库中有与待译文本完全相同的原文句段，OmegaT 会按照 <m0> <g1>选项</g1> <g2>编辑行为...</g2> </m0> 对话框窗口中的内容进行操作。
If the translator attempts to modify them, they will go back to their original state whenever the project is opened, closed, saved or reloaded.
如果译者试图修改它们，则只要项目被打开、关闭、保存或重新载入，它们就会回复到原始状态。
If there are any differences, check that the <f0>filters.xml</f0> and <f1>segmentation.conf</f1> files are under version control.
如果两侧不一致，检查 <f0>filters.xml</f0> 和 <f1>segmentation.conf</f1> 文件是否受版本控制。
If there's no file name displayed, the source is the internal project translation memory.
如果没有显示文件名，那么其来源是内部项目翻译记忆库。
If there's several alternative translations available for the active segment, you can label the alternative selected as the default translation.
如果当前片段有多个替代译文，您可以将所选择的译文标记为默认译文。
If they <e0>don't need</e0> to stay immune from further changes, then remove the TMX from /tm/enforce.
如果它们 <e0>需要</e0> 受进一步更改的影响，则将 TMX 从 /tm/enforce 中删除。
If they <e0>need</e0> to stay immune from further changes, then keep the TMX in /tm/enforce.
如果它们 <e0>无需</e0> 受进一步更改的影响，则将 TMX 保留在 /tm/enforce 中。
If you already have collected words you wish the spell checker to ignore / accept, you just need to copy the corresponding two files into the <f0>omegat</f0>subfolder of your current project.
如果您收集了希望忽略/接受拼写检查的词汇，您只需复制对应的两个文件到当前项目的 <f0>omegat</f0> 子文件夹中。
If you are interested in other settings of this dialog, you can return to it any time by pressing <k0>Ctrl+E.</k0>
如果对该对话框中的其他设置感兴趣，则随时都可以按 <k0>Ctrl+E</k0> 返回。
If you are using an authenticated proxy, please enter here your user and password.
如果您使用的是需要认证的代理服务器，请在此处输入用户和密码。
If you believe that you have lost translation data, you can use the following procedure to restore the project to its most recently saved state, usually not older than approximately 10 minutes or so:
如果您认为丢失了翻译数据，那么可以使用以下步骤将项目恢复到最近保存的状态，通常是大约 10 分钟以内：
If you can not see all the panes (be it opened or minimized), pressing <g0> Options > Restore Main Window </g0>will restore them to the state, defined in the installation.
如果无法看到所有窗格（已打开或最小化），按下 <g0> 选项 > 恢复主窗口 </g0>将其恢复为安装时定义的状态。

If you decide mid-translation to switch from sentence to paragraph translation, the internal translation memory of the project will not be changed (OmegaT may upgrade old translation memories that did not use sentence segmentation, but not vice versa), but OmegaT will attempt to create paragraph fuzzy matches by gluing together existing sentence translations.
如果您在翻译中途决定从语句翻译切换至段落翻译，项目的内部翻译记忆库不会更改（OmegaT 可能会升级不使用语句分割的旧翻译记忆库，但反之则不然），但 OmegaT 会尝试通过组合现有的句子翻译来创建段落模糊匹配。
If you enter names of folders that do not exist yet, <a0>OmegaT</a0> creates them for you.
如果输入的文件夹名称尚不存在，<a0>OmegaT</a0> 会为您创建新的文件夹.

If you have TransTips option activated (<g0>Options → TransTips</g0>), you can right click on the highlighted word in the source segment to open a pop-up menu with suggested translation, as offered by your glossary.
如果您激活了翻译提示（<g0>选项 → 翻译提示</g0>），则可以在原文句段内高亮标记的单词上单击右键，打开带有建议翻译的弹出菜单，建议翻译由术语表提供。

If you have a PDF file made of scanned pages (sometimes such files are referred to as ‘dead’ PDFs), you need to use an OCR (optical character recognition) program to recognize the text and convert it to a format that can be handled by OmegaT.
如果您有一个由扫描页面组成的 PDF 文件（此类文件有时被称为“死”PDF），您需要用 OCR（光学字符识别）程序识别文本并将其转换为 OmegaT 可以处理的格式。
If you have no doubt that a TMX is more accurate than the <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> of OmegaT, put this TMX in /tm/enforce to overwrite existing default translations unconditionally.
如果您确信某个 TMX 比 OmegaT 的 <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> 更靠谱，请将此 TMX 放到 /tm/enforce 中来无条件地覆盖现有的默认翻译。
If you haven't yet saved the project, this manually confirms whether you really wish to quit.
如果尚未保存项目，则此操作会手工确认您是否确实要退出。
If you need assistance with any aspect of OmegaT, feel free to join the <u1>OmegaT users group.</u1>
如果您需要关于 OmegaT 某些方面的帮助，可随时加入 <u1>OmegaT 用户组。</u1>
If you need to reproduce text formatting (as well as other things such as drawings) in your translation, there are three ways to try:
如果您需要在翻译中复现文本格式（以及其他东西，例如绘图），有三种方法可供尝试：
If you only need textual information (and not formatting information), use the level 1 file that OmegaT has created.
如果您只需要文本信息（而非格式化信息），请使用 OmegaT 创建的级别 1 文件。
If you place such translation memory files in the <f6>/tm/</f6> subfolder of a project, OmegaT will automatically search them for similar segments, called "fuzzy matches".
如果您把这种翻译记忆文件放在项目的 <f6>/tm/</f6> 子文件夹，则 OmegaT 会自动在其中搜索类似的句段（称为“模糊匹配”）。

If you right click on the Editor pane, a pop-up menu opens, offering<e0> Cut, Copy, Paste</e0> (i.e. same functions as <k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>X</k3> </k1>, <k4> <k5>Ctrl</k5> <k6>C</k6> </k4> and <k7> <k8>Ctrl</k8> <k9>V</k9> </k7>), <e10>GoTo segment</e10> and <e11>Add glossary entry</e11> functions.

如果在编辑器窗格上点击右键，会弹出一个菜单，提供 <e0> 剪切、复制、粘贴</e0> （即与 <k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>X</k3> </k1>, <k4> <k5>Ctrl</k5> <k6>C</k6> </k4> 和 <k7> <k8>Ctrl</k8> <k9>V</k9> </k7> 的作用相同）、 <e10>跳转到句段</e10> 和 <e11>增加术语词条</e11> 功能。
If you select a text string (in any pane) before pressing <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>F</k2> </k0>, the text will be pasted by default in the <g3>Search for</g3> field.
如果您按<k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>F</k2> </k0>之前（于任意窗格中）选择了文本字符串，则默认会将选中的文本粘贴到<g3>查找</g3>字段。
If you select a text string (in any pane) before pressing <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>K</k2> </k0>, the text will be pasted by default in the <g3>Search for</g3> field.
如果您在按<k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>K</k2> </k0>之前（于任意窗格中）选择了文本字符串，则默认会将选中的文本粘贴到<g3>查找</g3>字段。
If you select a text string (in any pane) before pressing <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>Shift</k2> <k3>G</k3> </k0>, the text will be pasted by default in the <g4>Source term</g4> field.
如果您在按<k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>Shift</k2> <k3>G</k3> </k0>之前（于任意窗格中）选择了文本字符串，则默认会将选中的文本粘贴到<g4>原文词汇</g4>字段中。
If you want the translation to be the same as the source, simply make the editing field empty by removing all the text (select all with <k0>Ctrl+A</k0> and delete with <k1>Del</k1>).
如果您想要让译文与原文相同，只需删除编辑区中的所有文本（用 <k0>Ctrl+A</k0> 选中所有内容并用 <k1>Del</k1> 删除。
If you wish to use such files as reference translations in OmegaT, they must be repaired, or OmegaT will report an error and fail to load them.
如果您想在 OmegaT 中使用这类文件作为参考译文，则必须对其进行修复，否则 OmegaT 将报错并无法加载它们。
If your source files are formatted files, e.g. Microsoft Word, LibreOffice Writer or HTML, OmegaT will convert the formatting into tags that surround the text that you translate.
如果源文件是格式化文件，如 Microsoft Word、LibreOffice Writer 或 HTML，OmegaT 会把待译文本周围的格式转换为标签。
Ignore All
全部忽略
Import the source file to <u0>LibreOffice Draw</u0>, save it as an ODG file, translate, export to PDF as needed.
导入源文件到 <u0>LibreOffice Draw</u0>，将其保存为 ODG 文件，翻译，然后按需要导出为 PDF。.
Importing and exporting translation memories
导入和导出翻译记忆库
In <g0>Heapwise</g0> mode, the texts are evaluated globally.
在<g0>Heapwise</g0>模式下，文本是整体评估的。
In <g1>Parsewise</g1> mode, they are evaluated segment by segment.
在<g1>Parsewise</g1>模式下，文本是逐个句段评估的。
In a similar fashion as above the user can create project-specific File filters, which will be stored together with the project and will be valid for the current project only.
同上述操作相同，用户可为项目创建专用的分割规则，更改后的过滤器配置的副本会随同项目一起存储，且仅针对该项目有效。
In a team project, this folder contains a versioned copy of the project tree structure linked directly to the remote server.
在团队项目中，此文件夹包含直接连接到远程服务器的项目树结构的版本副本。
In addition, two menu entries allow opening directly the current source and target documents and the writable glossary.
另外，有两个菜单项允许直接打开当前的原文与译文文档以及可写词汇表。

In addition, when the right click occurs on an opened segment, other options concerning <e12>Alternative translations</e12> are proposed, for example to to jump to another instance of non-unique segments.
此外，如果是在打开的句段上点击右键，还会提供与 <e12>替代译文</e12> 相关的其它选项，例如跳转到另一个非独特句段
In both cases, the project manager must send the translator their ID and password to access the repository.
两种情况下，项目经理都必须发给译者他们用来访问的存储库的 ID 和密码。
In case of OmegaT complete project folders - in other words the translation memories involved as well as source folders, project settings etc - are managed by the selected RCS.
在 OmegaT 的情况下，完整的项目文件夹——换句话说，设计的翻译记忆库和原文文件夹、项目设置等——均由选定 RCS 管理。

In case there are non-unique segments in source documents, the Auto-propagation check box offers the user the following two possibilities as regards automatic translation: if checked, the first translated segment will be assumed as the default translation and its target text will be automatically used for later hits during the translation process.
如果原文文档中包含非独特句段，自动传播翻译复选框为用户提供了下面两种自动翻译的可能性：如果勾选，则第一个被翻译的句段将假定为默认翻译，其译文文本在翻译过程中会自动用于后继命中。

In case translators need to share their TMX bases while excluding some of their parts or including just translations of certain files, sharing the complete <f0>ProjectName-omegat.tmx</f0> is out of question.
如果译者需要与别人分享他们的 TMX 而同时需要排除某些部分或者只要包含某些文件的翻译，那么可分享完整的翻译记忆库文件 <f0>项目名称-omegat.tmx</f0> 。
In case you decide to modify project folders, keep in mind that this will not move existing files from old folders to the new location.
如果您决定修改项目的文件夹，要记住这并不会将现有文件从旧文件夹移动到新位置。
In cases like these it becomes necessary to switch to RTL mode, so that the RTL (in fact bidirectional) text is displayed correctly.
在这类情况下，必须转换为从右向左模式，以正确显示从右向左（实际上是双向）文本。
In cases where a team of translators is involved, translators will prefer to share common translation memories rather than distribute their local versions.
如果涉及翻译团队，译者们会首选共享公共翻译记忆库而不是发布他们的本地版本。
In many cases, however, it is necessary to embed LTR text in RTL text.
然而在许多情况下，必须在从右向左文本中嵌入从左向右文本。
In most cases, the lower the <g0>Average score</g0> is, better the alignment will be.
在大多数情况下，<g0>平均得分</g0>越低，则对齐效果越好。
In some operating systems, this folder is not displayed by default.
在某些操作系统中，默认情况下不显示此文件夹。
In some seldom cases the alternative, i.e. segmenting by paragraphs, may be preferred.
在一些少见情况下，替代方案，即按段落分割，可能会更好。
In that case, yy is the number of other occurrences of the segment in the project.</l0>
在此情况下，yy 是此句段在项目中其他地方出现的次数。
In the <g0>Project</g0> menu, select <m1><g2>New...</g2></m1> and type a name for your project.
在 <g0>项目</g0> 菜单里，选择<m1><g2>新建...</g2></m1> 并输入项目名称。
In the Editor, the translation is displayed as <EMPTY>
在编辑器中，译文会显示为<空>
In the Exclusion patterns dialog, it is possible to Add or Remove a pattern, or edit one by selecting a line and pressing F2.
在排除模式对话框中，可以添加或删除模式，也可以通过选定一行并按 F2 来编辑。可以按
In the above case, the segments already translated are shown in yellow.
在上述情况下，已翻译的句段以黄色显示。
In the above example the source segment is <e0>Context menu command</e0>.
在上面的例子中，原文句段是 <e0>Context menu command</e0>。
In the editor pane, when a match is inserted from a TMX contained in a folder named <f0>mt</f0>, the background of the active segment is changed to red.
在编辑器窗格中，如果插入的匹配项来自名为 <f0>mt</f0> 文件夹中的 TMX 文件，当前所在句段的背景会变为红色。
In the example below, the author of the PO file included a warning for the translator to check the length of the translation:
在下方的例子中，PO 文件的作者给译者设置了警告，以检查译文长度：
In the following window you can indicate that the language selected is to be used in OmegaT.
在下一个窗口中，你可以选择是否要让 OmegaT 也使用这个语言。
In the target document, nothing will appear for this segment.
此片段在译文文档中不会显示任何东西。

在这种情况下，有用的流程可以是这样：

In this case, place the translation memories you wish to use in the <e0>/tm</e0> or <e1>/tm</e1>/auto folder of your new project: in the former case you will get hits from these translation memories in the fuzzy matches viewer, and in the latter case these TMs will be used to pre-translate your source text.
在这种情况下，将您需要的翻译记忆库文件放入 /auto 文件夹中：前一种情况下，会在模糊匹配查看器中看到来自于这些翻译记忆库的匹配，而后一种情况下，这些翻译记忆库将用于对原文文本进行预翻译。
In this case, the NL-EN translation memory can serve as a go-between to help generate NL to ZH translation.
在这种情况下，NL-EN 翻译记忆库可以作为一个中转来帮助生成 NL 到 ZH 的翻译。
In this case, the procedure is the same, but the project manager does not add files to the /source folder.
在这种情况下，流程是一样的，但项目经理不向 /source 文件夹中添加文件。
In this mode, "<g1>Cursor lock off</g1>" is displayed at the bottom of the pane.
此模式下， “<g1>光标锁定</g1>”显示在窗格底部。

信息

初始化

文件夹一开始是空的，它将包含您加入项目中的词典。

一开始，即项目创建时，项目的主翻译记忆库 <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> 为空。

术语表窗格允许您访问在术语表文件中建立的语言表达集和专业术语集。
The Java Resource Bundles filter threw an exception:
Java 资源包过滤器抛出异常：
The Moodle PHP filter threw an exception:
Moodle PHP 过滤器抛出异常：
The Moses server URL is not set
Moses 服务器网址未设置
The Mozilla DTD filter threw an exception:
Mozilla DTD 过滤器抛出异常：
The PO filter threw an exception:
PO 过滤器抛出异常：
The Project Manager should check with the translator that the statistics are identical on both sides (server side and translator side).
项目经理应当与译者核实确认两侧（服务器侧与译者侧）的统计数据是一致的。
The background is restored to normal when the segment is left.
离开此句段后背景恢复正常。
The best thing of course is to use OmegaT-specific TMX files (see above), so that the in-line formatting within the segment is retained.
当然，最好是使用 OmegaT 专用的 TMX 文件（见前文），这样能够保留句段中的内联格式。
The changes are displayed.
更改会显示出来。
The colours are displayed as long as the <l1><g2>Save auto-populated status</g2></l1> option is checked.
只要<l1><g2>保存自动填充状态</g2></l1>选项已勾选就会显示颜色。
The configuration folder will be used instead.
将改用目标文件夹为配置文件夹
The contents of the target subfolder will reflect the current state of the translation, as present in the project translation memory, saved in the current <e8>/omegat/project_save.tmx</e8>.
target 子文件夹的内容将反映当前的翻译状况，正如保存在当前项目记忆库中的内容，即 <e8>/omegat/project_save.tmx</e8>。
The contents of translation memories in the tm subfolder serve to generate suggestions for the text(s) to be translated.
tm 子文件夹中的翻译记忆库为生成待翻译文本提供建议。
The counters in the lower right corner keep track of the progress of the translation (numbers in the left hand column refer to the figure above):
右下角的计数器跟踪翻译进展（左侧一栏的数字代表上方的数）
The created target documents are located in the <f0>target</f0> folder.
创建的译文文档位于 <f0>target</f0> 文件夹中。
The current folder will be used instead.
将改用当前文件夹为配置文件夹。
The difference between "Number of segments" and "Number of unique segments" provides an approximate idea of the number of repetitions in the text.
通过“句段数”和“非重复句段数”之间的差值，我们可以大致了解文本的重复情况。

The difference is thin: we call "Window" a window that can stay open next to the editor and interact with it, and "dialog" a window where you must select parameters before closing it and pursuing your translation activity.
二者之间的区别很小：我们将编辑器旁可以维持开启状态并与之交互的窗口称为“窗口”，将选择参数后才能关闭并继续翻译活动的窗口称为“对话框”。
The display mode of the translated documents must be modified within the application (such as Microsoft Word) commonly used to display or modify them (check the relevant manuals for details).
译文文档的显示模式必须在通常用于显示或修改它的应用程序（诸如 Microsoft Word）中修改（详细信息请查看相关手册）。
The displayed text is split into segments and you may scroll through the document and double-click on any segment to open and edit it.
所显示的文本会划分为句段，您可以在文档中滚动并双击任意句段将其打开并进行编辑。
The documents are opened by the application chosen by the operating system.
这些文档是用操作系统所选择的应用程序打开的。
The entry will be greyed, if there's just one translation available.
如果只有一个可用译文，则该条目将为灰色。
The exported contents are copied to the file <f1>selection.txt</f1> located in the User's preference files folder.
导出的内容将被复制到位于用户偏好设置文件所在的文件夹内的 <f1>selection.txt</f1> 文件中。
The following recipe is just one of the possibilities, but simple enough to follow and without any dangers for the assets.
以下方案只是其中一种方法，不过足够简单、容易操作且没有危险性。
The inclusion rules take priority over the exclusion rules.
包含规则优先于排除规则。
The interval of 3 minutes can be changed in <l0><m1> <g2>Options</g2> <g3>Preferences</g3> <g4>Saving and Output</g4> </m1></l0>.
3 分钟的间隔可以在<l0><m1> <g2>选项</g2> <g3>首选项</g3> <g4>保存和输出</g4> </m1></l0>中更改。
The last segment with the identical source text will thus prevail (Note: of course it makes more sense to avoid this to happen in the first place).
因此，对于有着完全相同的原文文本的句段，会采用最后一个（注意：显然，先考虑避免出现这种情况会更有意义）。
The level 2 export is not fully compliant with the level 2 standard, but is sufficiently close and will generate correct matches in other translation memory tools supporting TMX Level 2.
级别 2 的导出不完全符合级别 2 标准高，但已足够接近并且在其他支持 TMX 级别 2 的翻译记忆工具中会生成正确的匹配。
The line with the matching percentage also includes the name of the translation memory containing the match.
显示匹配度百分比的那一行还有包含此匹配项的翻译记忆库的名称。
The machine translation pane, when opened, contains the suggestions by machine translation tools for the current segment.
当机器翻译窗格打开时，包括了机器翻译工具为当前句段提供的建议。
The main window consists of several panes, the main menu and a status bar.
主窗口由若干窗格、主菜单和状态栏组成。

The match viewer shows the most similar segments from translation memories, both from internal project translation memory created in real time as you translate your project and from ancillary translation memories you have imported from your earlier jobs, or received from your client or translation agency.
匹配查看器中显示了翻译记忆库中最相似的句段，来源既包括随着您对项目的翻译而实时创建的内部项目翻译记忆库，也包括来自您过往工作或从客户或翻译代理那里得到的辅助翻译记忆库。
The matching percentage is roughly equivalent to taking the number of common words in the matched and the matching segment and dividing by the number of words in the longer of the two.
匹配度百分比大致上等于匹配和被匹配句段中的公共单词数除以二者中较长的单词数。
The memory named <f5>omegat</f5> can be used by OmegaT itself, in future projects that you create.
名称为 <f5>omegat</f5> 的翻译记忆可被 OmegaT 自身用于将来创建的项目。
The most important file here is the <f1>project_save.tmx, </f1>that is the working translation memory for the project.
这里面最重要的文件是 <f1>project_save.tmx</f1>，它是项目的工作翻译记忆库。
The new set of rules will be stored together with the project and will not interfere with the general set of segmentation rules.
新的规则集将与项目一起存储，不会干扰到通用的分割规则集。
The next segment with a note attached to it, will open.
会打开下一个带有备注的片段。
The one and the same segment may, depending on the context, require different translations.
一个片段和另一个相同的片段可能会因为上下文而需要不同的译文。
The penalty applies to all three match percentages: matches 75, 80, 90 will in this case be lowered to 45, 50, 60.
三种匹配度百分比都会施加罚分：匹配度 75、80、90 在这个案例中会降为 45、50、60。
The predominant way of segmenting the sources is the sentence-level segmenting, so this check box should in a normal case be left checked.
语句级分割是分割原文的主要方式，所以正常情况下应该选中该复选框。
The previous segment with a note will open.
会打开上一个带有备注的片段。

The process above describes the usual case, where the project manager wants to have full control of the project and where the files (and the statistics) are identical on both sides (server side and translator side).
上面的流程是通常的情况，其中项目经理希望完全控制项目，文件（与统计数据）在两侧（服务器侧与译者侧）是一样的。
The project and TMX source languages should of course be identical - NL in our example.
项目的原文语言和 TMX 的原文语言当然应当是相同的——在这个例子中是 NL。
The project cannot be verified
无法验证项目

项目文件夹 {0} 丢失且无法创建。

例子中的项目已完成，所有独特句段已翻译完毕。
The project was converted successfully.
项目已成功转换。
The project will be loaded as a local project without team functionality.
此项目将作为没有团队功能的本地项目加载。

The results window is laid out in the form of a table in which:
结果窗口以表格的形式布置，其中：

在输入片段的序号或编号后就会打开该片段
The segmentation rules are generally valid across all the projects.
分割规则通常适用于所有项目。
The segmentation settings only address the way the source files are handled by <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
分割规则设置只影响处理原文文件的方式。
The selected fuzzy match is highlighted in bold, words that are missing in the segment you are translating are colored blue and words adjacent to the missing parts green.
选定的模糊匹配以粗体突出形式，正在翻译的句段中缺失的单词显示为蓝色，而与缺失部分相邻的单词显示为绿色。
The separators between the panes can be dragged to resize panes.
可以拖动窗格之间的分隔线以调整窗格大小。
The server is not a valid Apertium server.
此服务器不是有效的 Apertium 服务器。
The set of <e0>Unique </e0>segments is computed by taking all the segments and removing all duplicate segments.
<e0>非重复</e0>句段是所有句段减去重复句段得到的。
The solution in our example is to copy the existing translation memory into the tm/tmx2source/ subfolder and rename it to ZH_CN.tmx to indicate the target language of the tmx.
在这个例子中，解决方案是将已有的翻译记忆库复制到 tm/tmx2source/ 子文件夹中并将其重命名为 ZH_CN.tmx 来指示此 tmx 的译文语言。
The source and target files can have different formats (for example, a <f0>.docx</f0> file can be aligned with a <f1>.pdf</f1> file).

source 子文件夹包含待翻译文件。

The tags in OmegaT are greyed, so they are easy to recognise.
OmegaT 中的标签为灰色，因此很容易识别。

The title of the dialog reflects the file actually used (which depends on how many instances of OmegaT are running concurrently).
对话框的标题反映了实际使用的文件（这取决于并发运行的 OmegaT 实例的数量）。
The top match is 100%, because all words match.
最佳匹配项是 100%，因为所有单词都匹配上了。
The translated files will then need to be converted back to the original format.
然后需要将译文文件转换回原始格式。
The translation has changed.
译文已更改。

The translator can add notes to the opened segment, for instance to come back later to the segment and redo the translation, check that alternative translations are correct or to ask colleagues for their opinion.
译者可以给打开的句段添加备注，比如之后返回该句段重新翻译，检查替代译文是否正确，或者询问同事的意见。
The translator will be shown English translations for source segments in Dutch and use them to create the Chinese translation.
这样荷兰语的原文句段会以英文翻译的形式显示给译者，译者就能用它们来创建中文翻译。

The upper part is in the source language, in bold characters with a green background color, the lower part is the editing field, ended by a marker: the marker is <l0><segment nnnn></l0> where nnnn is a number of the segment in the project.
上半部分以原语言显示，为带绿色背景色的粗体字符；下半部分是编辑区域，以标记结尾：标记格式为 <l0><segment nnnn></l0>， 其中 nnnn 是项目中的一些句段。
The user, however, may need to generate a set of rules, specific to the project in question.
但是，用户可能需要生成一组所讨论项目专用的规则。
The writeable glossary file is not in the glossary folder.
该可写词汇表文件不在词汇表文件夹中。
Then you need a translation in e.g. Chinese, but your translator does not understand Dutch; she, however, understands perfectly English.
然后需要将其翻译为比如说中文，但其译者并不懂荷兰语，不过她精通英语。
There may be cases where you have done a project with e.g. Dutch sources, and a translation in say English.
某些情况下，您可能已经完成了一个项目，原文为比如说荷兰语，翻译为比如说英语。
There was an error initializing LanguageTool.
初始化 LanguageTool 时出错。
Therefore, press <k0>Ctrl+Shift+V</k0> before you generate your translated files, to validate that your tags are correct.
因此，在生成已译文件前请按下 <k0>Ctrl+Shift+V</k0> 以检验标签是否正确。
Therefore, the location of OmegaT's configuration folder cannot be reliably determined.
因此，无法确定 OmegaT 配置文件夹的位置。
These are the files present in the /source folder in a format that OmegaT is able to recognize.
这些文件位于 /source 文件夹中且 OmegaT 能够识别其格式。
These files won't be deleted automatically on the translator's side: you must ask them to delete the files manually.
这些文件在译者侧不会自动删除：必须让他们手工删除文件。
These settings apply to OmegaT level, to all projects.
这些设置是应用到 OmegaT 级别的，对所有项目生效。
They are protected, so that you cannot modify their contents, but you can delete them, enter them by hand or move them around in the target sentence.
这些标签受到保护，您无法修改它们的内容，但是可以删除、手动输入或移动它们在目标语句中的位置。
They contain text formatting information, but such information cannot be reused by <a0>OmegaT</a0> in order to create target files.
它们包含文本格式信息，但 <a0>OmegaT</a0>在创建目标文件时，无法重用此类信息。
This will delete your local data and re-download the project contents from the server.
这将删除你的本地数据并从服务器重新下载项目内容。
This API key has been blocked
此 API 密钥已被封
This ID is already being used.
此 ID 已被使用。
This JRE will not interfere with other Java implementations that may already be installed on your system.
此 JRE 不会干扰系统上可能已经安装的其他 Java 实现。
This TM gradually becomes filled during the translation.
在翻译过程中，翻译记忆库会逐渐丰富。
This URL appears to be invalid.
此 URL 似乎无效。
This applies also to the <l2>Project files</l2> window.
这也适用于 <l2>Project files</l2> 窗口。
This area allows entering an external post-processing command (for instance, a script to rename files) that will be applied each time Create Translated Documents is used.
此区域允许输入一个在每次使用“创建译文文档”之后都会应用的外部后处理命令（例如，用于重命名文件的脚本）。
This bar gives the user feedback on specific operations that are in progress.
它把正在进行的特定操作信息反馈给用户。

该调用不能在 swing 线程中

该调用必须在 swing 线程中

这也可以在 OmegaT 中完成：
This can apply also to <g0>Target term</g0> and <g1>Comment </g1>fields if new selections are made and <k2> <k3>Ctrl</k3> <k4>Shift</k4> <k5>G</k5> </k2> pressed again.
这也能应用于<g0>译文词汇</g0>和<g1>注释</g1>字段，只要做出新的选择并再次按下<k2> <k3>Ctrl</k3> <k4>Shift</k4> <k5>G</k5> </k2>即可。
This can be done in two ways:
有两种方式可以完成这一点：

这可以是 http（包括 https）、svn 或 git。

如果修改后的片段已经确认，则该命令不起作用。

在创建译文文档后将执行此命令。
This copies the selected files to the <f2>source</f2> folder and reloads the project to import the new files.
之后会把选择的文件复制到 <f2>source</f2> 文件夹，并重新加载项目导入新文件。
This dialog is accessible by selecting <m0> <g1>Project</g1> <g2>Properties...</g2> </m0>
此对话框可通过选择<g1>项目</g1> <g2>属性...</g2>
This document is the official user's guide to OmegaT, the free Computer Aided Translation tool.
本文档是免费的计算机辅助翻译工具 OmegaT 的官方用户指南。
This enables the translation memories produced by other tools to be read by OmegaT.
这使得 OmegaT 可以读取其他工具生成的翻译记忆库。<句段 1183>

这个外部命令不能包含“管道”等，因此建议调用一个脚本。
This folder is initially empty.

这在处理内联格式并不真正有用的文本（如 OCRed PDF、转换不良的 .odt 或 .docx 等）时特别有用。正常情况下译文文档应当都能打开，因为只移除了内联标签。

如果您经常使用过去生成的翻译记忆库，例如因为它们属于同一主题或者同一客户，则此功能非常有用。

此标记行为优先于<g0>标记已译片段</g0>和<g1>标记未译片段</g1>。

This means that if the source language is LTR and the target language is RTL, or vice versa, it may be necessary to toggle back and forth between RTL and LTR modes to view the source and enter the target easily in their respective modes.
这意味着如果原文语言是从左向右的而目标语言是从右向左的，或反之，就可能必须在从右向左和从左向右模式之间来回切换，以便在各自的模式下查看原文并输入译文。
This menu displays entries only when a project is open.
仅当打开了项目后此菜单下才会显示条目。
This modifies <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> (by adding proper Translation Units from "auto" TMX)
这将会修改 <f0>project_save.tmx</f0>（自“auto”TMX 文件中添加合适的翻译单元）
This modifies <f0>project_save.tmx</f0>.
这将会修改 <f0>project_save.tmx</f0>。
This number is displayed in brackets, next to the "Project file" title
此数字显示在“项目文件”标题旁边的括号内。
